Keys.name: Target name
Keys.description: The targetname of this end of the zipline

Keys.name: Target
Keys.description: The targetname of the other end of the zipline

Notes: You can also use move_rope and keyframe_rope to make decorative cables
Titanfall ziplines use a generic texture, unlike the Yellow texture used in Apex
Source Engine guides recommend using one move_rope then a series of keyframe_rope for each key
IIRC move_rope ends can be used to create loose cable ends
